overview: From December to March, Felix, Julien, Eric and Charles, with the rest of the gang of seasonal snow fighters, fight the cold of winter to be suspended for few months. Since ten years, every winter, we can see them perched on the steep roofs of the old town of Quebec City. These spidermen climb, shovel and de-ice. But beyond their work, somewhere between heaven, the city and the river, they found a temporary space for freedom.
title: Coureurs des toits
